ing: 1 pound boneless chicken breast halves, cooked and cubed
1 (16.5 ounce) can red beans, drained and rinsed
n: Hobart's Chicken and Red Bean Soup
des: "This is a delicious and quick recipe for "stay at home" meal.  A tomato-based soup that will please the whole family."
ins: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, combine diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, water and onion.  Bring to a boil, then stir in cooked chicken, beans, broccoli, carrots, salt, pepper, Cajun seasoning and garlic powder.  Let boil 5 minutes, then reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes more.
